channel.title: attack.t1552.001 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1552.001 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Extracting Information with PowerShell
item.description: Adversaries may search local file systems and remote file shares for files containing insecurely stored credentials. These can be files created by users to store their own credentials, shared credential stores for a group of individuals, configuration files containing passwords for a system or service, or source code/binary files containing embedded passwords.

item.title: Suspicious Unattend.xml File Access
item.description: Attempts to access unattend.xml, where credentials are commonly stored, within the Panther directory where installation logs are stored. If these files exist, their contents will be displayed. They are used to store credentials/answers during the unattended windows install process

item.title: Azure Keyvault Secrets Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when secrets are modified or deleted in Azure.

item.title: Azure Keyvault Key Modified or Deleted
item.description: Identifies when a Keyvault Key is modified or deleted in Azure.

item.title: Azure Key Vault Modified or Deleted.
item.description: Identifies when a key vault is modified or deleted.

item.title: Automated Collection Command Prompt
item.description: Once established within a system or network, an adversary may use automated techniques for collecting internal data.

item.title: Cisco Collect Data
item.description: Collect pertinent data from the configuration files

item.title: Judgement Panda Credential Access Activity
item.description: Detects Russian group activity as described in Global Threat Report 2019 by Crowdstrike
